data.message: So cause I am a woman people expect me to sit around and be docile and when people are sitting around being rude af, abusing me or getting physical with me I am supposed to just sit there like a little b.tch and take it? Not sure what planets these b.tches live on but I am going to fight back if I have to and people are gonna wish they didn't make me... I'd punch a dude in the face, a woman, a transgender, my own mama for fkn with me... you name it as to be expected.
